statements: SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, side_effect FROM adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM adverse_reactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect = 'Nausea' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM adverse_reactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND side_effect = 'Headache';
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM adverse_reactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect LIKE '%rash%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect = 'Nausea' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, drug_name FROM adverse_reactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT drug_name, side_effect FROM adverse_reactions ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 50;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT drug_name, side_effect FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect LIKE '%rash%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE reaction LIKE '%rash%';
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM drugs ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE reaction = 'Fever';

SELECT patients.name, drugs.name, adverse_reactions.reaction FROM patients LEFT JOIN adverse_reactions ON patients.id = adverse_reactions.patient_id LEFT JOIN drugs ON adverse_reactions.drug_id = drugs.id;

SELECT patients.name AS patient_name, drugs.name AS drug_name, adverse_reactions.reaction AS reaction_type FROM adverse_reactions INNER JOIN patients ON adverse_reactions.patient_id = patients.id INNER JOIN drugs ON adverse_reactions.drug_id = drugs.id WHERE patients.age > 50;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS reaction_count, drugs.name AS drug_name FROM adverse_reactions INNER JOIN drugs ON adverse_reactions.drug_id = drugs.id GROUP BY adverse_reactions.drug_id HAVING reaction_count > 3 ORDER BY reaction_count DESC;

SELECT patients.name AS patient_name, drugs.name AS drug_name, adverse_reactions.reaction AS reaction_type FROM adverse_reactions INNER JOIN patients ON adverse_reactions.patient_id = patients.id INNER JOIN drugs ON adverse_reactions.drug_id = drugs.id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, side_effect, date_reported FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, side_effect, date_reported FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect = 'Dizziness';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE side_effect = 'Nausea';
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, side_effect FROM adverse_reactions WHERE date_reported > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 10;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, drug_id, dosage_amount FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, side_effect FROM adverse_reactions ORDER BY reaction_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS reaction_count FROM adverse_reactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, drug_name, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, drug_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
